IVirtualMachineScaleSetsOperations IVirtualMachineScaleSetsOperations Interface

In this Article

Edit

VirtualMachineScaleSetsOperations operations.

Syntax

Declaration

public interface IVirtualMachineScaleSetsOperationsPublic Interface IVirtualMachineScaleSetsOperations

Methods summary

BeginCreateOrUpdateWithHttpMessagesAsync(String, String, VirtualMachineScaleSet, Dictionary<String, List<String>>, CancellationToken)
BeginCreateOrUpdateWithHttpMessagesAsync(String, String, VirtualMachineScaleSet, Dictionary(Of String, List(Of String)), CancellationToken)

Create or update a VM scale set.
BeginDeallocateWithHttpMessagesAsync(String, String, IList<String>, Dictionary<String, List<String>>, CancellationToken)
BeginDeallocateWithHttpMessagesAsync(String, String, IList(Of String), Dictionary(Of String, List(Of String)), CancellationToken)

Deallocates specific virtual machines in a VM scale set. Shuts down the virtual machines and releases the compute resources. You are not billed for the compute resources that this virtual machine scale set deallocates.
BeginDeleteInstancesWithHttpMessagesAsync(String, String, IList<String>, Dictionary<String, List<String>>, CancellationToken)
BeginDeleteInstancesWithHttpMessagesAsync(String, String, IList(Of String), Dictionary(Of String, List(Of String)), CancellationToken)

Deletes virtual machines in a VM scale set.
BeginDeleteWithHttpMessagesAsync(String, String, Dictionary<String, List<String>>, CancellationToken)
BeginDeleteWithHttpMessagesAsync(String, String, Dictionary(Of String, List(Of String)), CancellationToken)

Deletes a VM scale set.
BeginPowerOffWithHttpMessagesAsync(String, String, IList<String>, Dictionary<String, List<String>>, CancellationToken)
BeginPowerOffWithHttpMessagesAsync(String, String, IList(Of String), Dictionary(Of String, List(Of String)), CancellationToken)

Power off (stop) one or more virtual machines in a VM scale set. Note that resources are still attached and you are getting charged for the resources. Instead, use deallocate to release resources and avoid charges.
BeginReimageAllWithHttpMessagesAsync(String, String, Dictionary<String, List<String>>, CancellationToken)
BeginReimageAllWithHttpMessagesAsync(String, String, Dictionary(Of String, List(Of String)), CancellationToken)

Reimages all the disks ( including data disks ) in the virtual machines in a virtual machine scale set. This operation is only supported for managed disks.

BeginReimageWithHttpMessagesAsync(String, String, Dictionary(Of String, List(Of String)), CancellationToken)

Reimages (upgrade the operating system) one or more virtual machines in a VM scale set.

ListAllNextWithHttpMessagesAsync(String, Dictionary<String, List<String>>, CancellationToken)
ListAllNextWithHttpMessagesAsync(String, Dictionary(Of String, List(Of String)), CancellationToken)

Gets a list of all VM Scale Sets in the subscription, regardless of the associated resource group. Use nextLink property in the response to get the next page of VM Scale Sets. Do this till nextLink is not null to fetch all the VM Scale Sets.

ListAllWithHttpMessagesAsync(Dictionary(Of String, List(Of String)), CancellationToken)

Gets a list of all VM Scale Sets in the subscription, regardless of the associated resource group. Use nextLink property in the response to get the next page of VM Scale Sets. Do this till nextLink is not null to fetch all the VM Scale Sets.
